articles.title: 10 benefits of taking stairs for 2-3 floors daily - The Times of India
articles.description: Incorporating a daily routine of taking stairs for 2-3 floors is a simple yet powerful way to promote physical fitness, enhance cardiovascular health, and improve overall well-being.
articles.content: As a weight-bearing activity, stair climbing strengthens the muscles of the legs, including the quadriceps, hamstrings, calves, and glutes, promoting lower body strength and stability.
